title: Systems Engineering Intern (Camera Electronics)
summary: The camera is the heart piece of Apple products for many of our users. Breathtaking photos and videos keep precious moments, magic machine vision makes life easier and more enjoyable. There is so much to see in this world and the cameras developed by our team capture it. Imagine what you can accomplish as part of this team. Working hand in hand with our innovative experts, you will have a chance to bring the camera sensors to life. Your accomplishments will enable new inspiring products for millions of Apple’s customers.
description: As an intern in Camera Electronics team, you will be an integral part of dynamic projects that leverage advanced modeling and simulation techniques to engineer Camera subsystems. Your primary responsibilities will include creating detailed executable camera system models and using simulation to analyze and validate system behavior. With mentorship and in partnership with your colleagues you will have unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in a real-world Camera sensor engineering environment.
preferred_qualifications: Systems Modeler is a strong plus. Eagerness to learn new things and take up new challenges. Ability to work on multi-functional projects with a globally located team.
